CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): A.1.3a, transmissiondateformat (3N) --> value should be 102 AND A.1.3b, transmissiondate (8N), covert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): C.1.2 Date of Creation User Guidance: This data element has the function of a timestamp and represents the equivalent of a version number for the ICSR. Every ICSR and every iteration (e.g. version) of an ICSR in a safety message must have a different value for Date of Creation. The most recent version of an ICSR will have the most recent date; previous versions of an ICSR will have older dates. Conformance: Required Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: See Appendix II for further information.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element has the function of a timestamp and represents the equivalent of a version number for the ICSR.
CustomField.label: Date/Time Opened
